author: creole griot
text:
And one last family thing: look at my niece in the background lmao… if “up to no good”was a person.

text: I love Normani’s look because it’s not just like a costume/exact replica of whatever the theme is. It’s a fresh take on it. Which is what I thought this was supposed to be.

author: creole griot
text: And they have all these reasons around it to do with the state of the world and the planet and connecting with nature, etc. But how she just connected that to Adam & Eve and cultivating and maintaining a garden being the fundamental human task… 🤯

author: creole griot
text: Also literally every “spiritual” person I seriously engage with is talking soooo much about gardens. I’m talking full deep dive courses. A cynic would think it’s just the market or something. But a romantic such as myself is like wowwww they’re all getting the same downloads https://t.co/7u3O3qNbGF

author: creole griot
text: Only took six years to be almost over it 😅

author: creole griot
text: That whole “time heals” thing has felt like it was evading me for a long time now. Grateful to finally be getting a little relief. Maybe next year I won’t even remember it.

author: creole griot
text: I usually commemorate this day but this year it finally didn’t feel like I should. Finally some progress.

author: creole griot
text:
Totally unrelated to the topic but I saw this the other day and thought “I’m so far behind, ppl be posting workouts I have no clue about.” Today my trainer had me do this. I felt so advanced lol. 

Reminder: you’re doing better than you think. you’re closer than you realize. https://t.co/K2rukgUdWM

author: creole griot
text: I tend to be friendly when I’m hanging out at bars or interacting with strangers in general. But I guess I have to sit there with resting bitch face if I don’t want people to assume that after we speak to each other one time, I wanna date/have sex/get married idk shit’s weird

author: creole griot
text: 3. The best compliments for me are when little black girls shyly come up and say “I like your outfit.” Undefeated.
